::Slayer::

"Allright. Be ready," Slayer replies to Ignatis, suddenly turning to 
head right toward the bots following him. He sets his jets on maximum 
burn, zoomning over the Predacons' heads and firing two signature 
seeking missiles when he was right above them, and then slowing down 
slightly so that they could keep up. He was heading toward Ignatis's 
position.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Ignatius detected enemy fire from long range. The eagle went into a
> powerdive avoiding the shots. "So that's the game. I'll teach them 
my
> rules." he fired two wing missles at Attila and five bursts from his 
eyes at
> Luzbel. He stayed close to the water trying to use the water to 
confuse the
> sensors. He knew that the closer he got the more likely he'd be 
detected and
> attacked.
> 
> The call to retreat came through from Slayer. "We can't retreat yet, 
I'm
> barely warmed up." he wanted to rescue the leader even though he 
knew that
> Prebon had made a strategic mistake (To put it lightly) attacking 
the Iron
> fist. He vowed allegiance to his leader and intended to follow it 
through to
> the end.
> 
> Long range scanners showed Slayer going the opposite direction. He 
switched
> frequencies and called Slayer again. "Lead them back toward me, I'll 
lay
> down coverfire." Ignatius wasn't facing fire from the fortress so he 
knew
> that he was out of range. He transformed to robot mode and dove into 
the
> water. he set all operating functions on minimal hoping thier 
attension
> would
